name: Fists of Fire VR
description:
HADOUKEN !!! DODGE , SHOOT and BLOCK attacks from enemies in this 3D game that uses your hands to generate powerful FIREBALLS you can shoot at your enemies.

FISTS OF FIRE VR uses the Leap Motion mounted to the Oculus Rift DK2 to create a physically immersive experience where your hands and position are critical aspects of game play.

Requirements :

  • Oculus Rift DK2 ( 0.7 )
  • Leap Motion ( Mounted on DK2 head set )
  • Decent Video Card / CPU ( tested on quad core 3.4gz / GTX 980 )

Instructions

  • Make sure the leap motion + Oculus Rift DK2 are plugged in
  • The position tracking in DK2 via the camera is mandatory to play this game
  • Position your self 3 feet from the DK2 camera so you want a wider area to move in
  • Aim the camera vertically so you feel your at a good height in game

Best Regards,

Stephan Tanguay
